attributes.action: Publish full data for every third phase clinical trial
attributes.additional_details:
Clinical trials researchers  generally publish papers and reports about their trials, only if they successfully answer the original research question.  They often hide the results of trials that fail to prove their points.
Every patient and every prescribing physician should have easy access to all data recorded in every clinical trial.  So should other researchers who may wish to test the  data analysis.
Such openness would protect against poor therapy claims and give more trust to the public.
